greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Size of largest conjugacy class in the group GL(2,Z_n).
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) is multiplicative. a(p^e) = (p+1) * p^(2e - k), k = 1 if p is odd, k = 2 if p is 2.
Dirichlet convolution of A000082 with a signed variant of A099892. (End)
mathematica: f[n_] := Block[{a = 1, b = FactorInteger[n]}, While[ Length[b] > 0, a = a*(b[[1, 1]] + 1)*b[[1, 1]]^(2b[[1, 2]] - If[ OddQ[ b[[1, 1]]], 1, 2]); b = Drop[b, 1]]; a]; Table[ f[n], {n, 1, 55}]
f[p_, e_] := (p + 1)*p^(2*e - If[p == 2, 2, 1]); a[1] = 1; a[n_] := Times @@ f @@@ FactorInteger[n]; Array[a, 100] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Sep 14 2020 *)
results.author: Sharon Sela (sharonsela(AT)hotmail.com), May 14 2002
